articles.title: Former employee at Mass. post office pleads guilty after secretly recording female co-workers
articles.description:
After the man’s hidden camera and secret recordings were discovered, he later made an attempt to destroy the evidence, according to officials.

The post Former employee at Mass. post office pleads guilty after secretly recording female co-workers appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former post office employee pleaded guilty to secretly recording female co-workers.
The man attempted to destroy evidence after his hidden camera was discovered.
This case raises concerns about workplace privacy and safety for Boston employees.

articles.title: Drake Maye and the Patriots take on Sam Darnold and the Seahawks in Super Bowl 60
articles.description:
The 23-year old Maye will be the second-youngest quarterback to start a Super Bowl.

The post Drake Maye and the Patriots take on Sam Darnold and the Seahawks in Super Bowl 60 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Drake Maye, 23, will be the second-youngest quarterback to start a Super Bowl.
The Patriots face the Seahawks in Super Bowl 60 on February 12, 2026.
Local fans anticipate a thrilling matchup, boosting community spirit and engagement.

articles.title: Jewish groups sue Medford over values-based investment ordinance
articles.description:
Plaintiffs say the city’s policy unlawfully mandates divestment based on ideology.

The post Jewish groups sue Medford over values-based investment ordinance appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jewish groups filed a lawsuit against Medford over an investment ordinance on February 8, 2026.
Plaintiffs argue the ordinance unlawfully mandates divestment based on ideological beliefs.
The outcome may affect local investment policies and community relations in Medford.

articles.title: ‘We will pay,’ Savannah Guthrie says in desperate video plea to potential kidnappers of her mother
articles.description:
The “Today” show host was referencing a message that was sent to the Tucson-based television station KOLD on Friday afternoon.

The post ‘We will pay,’ Savannah Guthrie says in desperate video plea to potential kidnappers of her mother appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Savannah Guthrie made a video plea regarding her mother's kidnapping on February 8.
The plea was directed to potential kidnappers and aired on Tucson's KOLD station.
Boston residents may feel concern for Guthrie's family and the safety of local communities.

articles.title: Breezy Johnson wins Olympic downhill on day marred by American teammate Lindsey Vonn’s crash
articles.description:
The 30-year-old Johnson joins Vonn, 41, as the only American women to win the Olympic downhill.

The post Breezy Johnson wins Olympic downhill on day marred by American teammate Lindsey Vonn’s crash appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Breezy Johnson wins Olympic downhill, becoming a top American female skier.
Johnson, 30, joins Lindsey Vonn, 41, as Olympic downhill champions.
Vonn's crash raises concerns about athlete safety in competitive skiing.
